column2:
"Okay, now that I have your report, your request
to lift the cap can proceed. We look forward
to bigger and better things from you."

"At least, that's what the ARKS Code Reporting
Section says I should say. Now, I'm going to go
off the record here."

"While being able to carry more weapons is
definitely more convenient, it doesn't mean
that you've become stronger."

"I'm just here to approve licenses, permits, and
whatnot. What you do with them is up to you."

"Still, your success is my success, so please
don't make me regret giving you this permit."
